plays.text: Goal scored by Cory Stillman assisted by Pavol Demitra and Al MacInnis
Penalty to Ryan Johnson 2 minutes for Elbowing Andrei Zyuzin
Penalty to Matt Johnson 2 minutes for Charging Steve Martins
Penalty to Al MacInnis 2 minutes for Hooking Marian Gaborik
Penalty to Christian Laflamme 2 minutes for Interference Matt Johnson
